translated: The wisdom that engages the single characteristic of that form by means of the absence of antidotes is called “wisdom.”

original: nyi tshe ba'i shes pas mi thul ba'i tshul gyis shes rab kyi dbang po zhes bya'o //
analyzed: nyi tshe ba'i shes pas mi thul ba'i tshul gyis shes rab kyi dbang po zhes bya'o //

original: gang gzugs la rnam par mi rtog pa dang / rnam par mi sgrub pa dang / lhun gyis grub pa'i dran pa'i shes pa dang / shin tu mthar thug pa la 'jug pa'i mchog dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang mtshungs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku la dran pa nye bar 'jog pa dang /
analyzed: gang gzugs la rnam par mi rtog pa dang / rnam par mi sgrub pa dang / lhun gyis grub pa'i dran pa'i shes pa dang / shin tu mthar thug pa la 'jug pa'i mchog dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang mtshungs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku la dran pa nye bar 'jog pa dang /
translated: It is the knowledge of the Tathāgata’s mindfulness that is unattached to form, that does not establish form, that is spontaneously mindful, that is the supreme entrance into the ultimate, that is the same as the limit of reality, that is the mindfulness of the Tathāgata’s Dharma body,

original: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mi thul ba'i shes pa de ni dran pa'i stobs zhes bya'o //
analyzed: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mi thul ba'i shes pa de ni dran pa'i stobs zhes bya'o //
translated: and that is the knowledge that cannot be overcome by any of the śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas. This is called the power of mindfulness.

original: gang gzugs la de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi mthar thug pa dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi las yang dag par sgrub pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin lhun gyis grub pa'i thob pa dang / phyin ci log thams cad la g-yeng ba med pa shes pa de ni mi thul ba'i phyir ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs zhes bya'o //
analyzed: gang gzugs la de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi mthar thug pa dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi las yang dag par sgrub pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin lhun gyis grub pa'i thob pa dang / phyin ci log thams cad la g-yeng ba med pa shes pa de ni mi thul ba'i phyir ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs zhes bya'o //
translated: “It is the knowledge of the Tathāgata’s wisdom that is the culmination of form, that accomplishes the activity of the realm of phenomena, that is the spontaneous attainment of the Tathāgata’s samādhi, and that is undistracted by any error. This is called the power of samādhi because it cannot be overcome.

original: gang gzugs la chos kyi dbyings 'khrugs pa med par rtog pa dang / mtha' dang / mtha' ma yin pa gnyis su med par rab tu @321b shes pa dang / rnam par gzhag pa'i mtha' la lhun gyis grub pa'i dran pa shes pa dang / gnas pa med pa'i dngos po rab tu shes pa de ni shes rab kyi stobs zhes bya'o //
analyzed: gang gzugs la chos kyi dbyings 'khrugs pa med par rtog pa dang / mtha' dang / mtha' ma yin pa gnyis su med par rab tu @321b shes pa dang / rnam par gzhag pa'i mtha' la lhun gyis grub pa'i dran pa shes pa dang / gnas pa med pa'i dngos po rab tu shes pa de ni shes rab kyi stobs zhes bya'o //
translated: The power of wisdom is the understanding that the realm of phenomena is not disturbed by form, the thorough understanding of the non-duality of extremes and non-extremes, the knowledge of effortless mindfulness of the extreme of establishment, and the thorough understanding of the non-abiding of things.

original: gang gzugs la gnas med pa'i dran pa mngon du yang dag par rtog pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul dang mthun pa dang / skye ba med pa la zhugs pa rnams kyi dran pa yid la byed pa med pa'i tshul du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa de ni dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ces bya'o //
analyzed: gang gzugs la gnas med pa'i dran pa mngon du yang dag par rtog pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul dang mthun pa dang / skye ba med pa la zhugs pa rnams kyi dran pa yid la byed pa med pa'i tshul du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa de ni dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ces bya'o //
translated: The mindfulness factor of complete awakening is the correct realization of the mindfulness of the non-abiding of form, the concordance with the domain of the Tathāgatas, and the complete and perfect awakening in the manner of the non-mentation of mindfulness for those who have entered non-arising.

original: gang gzugs la chos kyi dbyings su rab tu shes pa dang / mi dmigs pa'i rnal 'byor gyi shes pas rab tu rnam par 'byed pa la mkhas pa dang / chos dang / chos ma yin pa gnyis khong du chud pa de ni chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub yan lag ces bya'o; ;gang gzugs la rang bzhin gyis chos kyi sku yin pas mi thul bar mngon du yang dag par rtog pa dang /
analyzed: gang gzugs la chos kyi dbyings su rab tu shes pa dang / mi dmigs pa'i rnal 'byor gyi shes pas rab tu rnam par 'byed pa la mkhas pa dang / chos dang / chos ma yin pa gnyis khong du chud pa de ni chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub yan lag ces bya'o; ;gang gzugs la rang bzhin gyis chos kyi sku yin pas mi thul bar mngon du yang dag par rtog pa dang /
translated: The branch of perfect discernment of phenomena is the discernment of form as the realm of phenomena, the skill in discerning through the knowledge of the yoga of non-apprehension, and the understanding of both phenomena and non-phenomena.🔽The branch of perfect effort is the realization that form is the unassailable dharmakāya by nature,

original: chos nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus mi 'dor ba de ni brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ces bya'o //
analyzed: chos nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus mi 'dor ba de ni brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ces bya'o //
translated: and the exertion in order to fully awaken to the true nature of phenomena.

original: gang gzugs la dbyer med par rab tu rnam par 'byed pa la mkhas pa dang / dpyod pa'i shes pa dang / lhun gyis grub pa rab tu rnam par 'byed pa bya ba gnas med pa'i shes pa'i yang dag par 'grub pa dang / shin tu sbyangs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /🔽btang snyoms dang / ye shes @322a *//
analyzed: gang gzugs la dbyer med par rab tu rnam par 'byed pa la mkhas pa dang / dpyod pa'i shes pa dang / lhun gyis grub pa rab tu rnam par 'byed pa bya ba gnas med pa'i shes pa'i yang dag par 'grub pa dang / shin tu sbyangs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / btang snyoms dang / ye shes @322a *//
translated: It is the skill in discerning form as indivisible, the knowledge of discernment, the spontaneous discernment of the knowledge of the non-abiding of things, the knowledge of the accomplishment of the concentration of pliancy,🔽the knowledge of the experience of the joy of equanimity and wisdom.

original: kyi dga' ba myong ba'i shes pa de ni dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ces bya'o //
analyzed: kyi dga' ba myong ba'i shes pa de ni dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ces bya'o //
translated: This is called the limb of enlightenment of joy.🔽It is the knowledge of the uninterrupted mental activity of all the objects of observation of form, and the knowledge of the equality of things and non-things in all the doors of liberation.

original: gang gzugs la dmigs pa thams cad yid la byed pa'i rgyun mi gcod pa'i shes pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i skye mched thams cad la dngos po dang / dngos po med pa mnyam pa nyid du shes pa de ni shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ces bya'o //
analyzed: gang gzugs la dmigs pa thams cad yid la byed pa'i rgyun mi gcod pa'i shes pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i skye mched thams cad la dngos po dang / dngos po med pa mnyam pa nyid du shes pa de ni shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ces bya'o //
translated: This is called the limb of enlightenment of pliancy.

original: gang gzugs la rnam par bltas nas chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du shes pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag sgrib pa med pa'i rkyen dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad gcig tu mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa de ni ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ces bya'o //
analyzed: gang gzugs la rnam par bltas nas chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du shes pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag sgrib pa med pa'i rkyen dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad gcig tu mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa de ni ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ces bya'o //
translated: It is the concentration that, having seen form, knows the sameness of all phenomena, the condition of the unobstructed branches of enlightenment, and the complete and perfect enlightenment of all concentrations and meditative absorptions as one.

original: gang gzugs la dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid du mngon du yang dag par rtog pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs med pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid dang / rab tu 'dzin pa dang / rtsod pa dang / rnam par 'byed pa la btang snyoms pa dang /
analyzed: gang gzugs la dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid du mngon du yang dag par rtog pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs med pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid dang / rab tu 'dzin pa dang / rtsod pa dang / rnam par 'byed pa la btang snyoms pa dang /
translated: It is the concentration that realizes the sameness of the nature of the nonexistence of form, the sameness of all form and formlessness, and the equanimity of apprehending, disputing, and discerning.

original: lhun gyis grub pa dang / ye shes dang / ye shes la mnyam pa nyid dang / thob pa'i chos thams cad mi skyed pa dang / rgyu ba med pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / btang snyoms shes pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /
analyzed: lhun gyis grub pa dang / ye shes dang / ye shes la mnyam pa nyid dang / thob pa'i chos thams cad mi skyed pa dang / rgyu ba med pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / btang snyoms shes pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /
translated: spontaneous accomplishment, wisdom, the sameness of wisdom, the non-arising of all attained dharmas, the absence of movement, samādhi, the knowledge of equanimity, the limbs of awakening,

original: lam rnams skye ba med pa'i mtha' dang thob pa rnams mi 'tshol ba de ni btang snyoms @322b yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ces bya'o //
analyzed: lam rnams skye ba med pa'i mtha' dang thob pa rnams mi 'tshol ba de ni btang snyoms @322b yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ces bya'o //
translated: and the paths—the non-arising of the limits and the non-pursuit of attainments—that is called the limb of awakening of right equanimity.

original: gang gzugs mthong nas khams dang skye mched rnams la dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin du mthong zhing yan lag dang yan lag med pa'i tshul gyis mnyam pa nyid du mthong ba dang / 'phags pa'i lam rnams lam med pa'i tshul gyis lta ba dang mi 'grogs pa dang /
analyzed: gang gzugs mthong nas khams dang skye mched rnams la dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin du mthong zhing yan lag dang yan lag med pa'i tshul gyis mnyam pa nyid du mthong ba dang / 'phags pa'i lam rnams lam med pa'i tshul gyis lta ba dang mi 'grogs pa dang /
translated: “When one sees form, one sees the elements and sense sources as having the nature of non-entity and as sameness in the manner of having no parts or divisions. One does not associate with views in the manner of the noble paths being non-paths.

original: 'phags pa'i lam rnams dang lta bar gyur pa thams cad mtshan nyid med par gcig pa'i tshul gyis lta ba dang mi 'grogs pa dang / mi 'khrugs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba yang dag pa zhes bya ba dang / chos thams cad mthong pa'i tshul gyis lta ba zhes bya ba dang /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam rnams dang lta bar gyur pa thams cad mtshan nyid med par gcig pa'i tshul gyis lta ba dang mi 'grogs pa dang / mi 'khrugs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba yang dag pa zhes bya ba dang / chos thams cad mthong pa'i tshul gyis lta ba zhes bya ba dang /
translated: The way of seeing all phenomena is called the ‘view.’

original: mi skye ba thob pa'i tshul gyis lam zhes bya ba'am /
analyzed: mi skye ba thob pa'i tshul gyis lam zhes bya ba'am /
translated: The way of attaining non-arising is called the ‘path.’🔽The way of sameness is called ‘correct.’🔽The way of being free from obscurations is called the ‘view.’🔽The way of engaging with all paths and non-paths is called the ‘path.’

original: mnyam pa nyid kyi tshul gyis yang dag pa zhes bya ba dang / sgrib pa med pa'i tshul gyis lta ba zhes bya ba dang / lam dang lam ma yin pa thams cad la 'jug pa'i tshul gyis lam zhes bya ba de ni yang dag pa'i lta ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: mnyam pa nyid kyi tshul gyis yang dag pa zhes bya ba dang / sgrib pa med pa'i tshul gyis lta ba zhes bya ba dang / lam dang lam ma yin pa thams cad la 'jug pa'i tshul gyis lam zhes bya ba de ni yang dag pa'i lta ba zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called ‘correct view.’

original: gang gzugs la rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog pa thams cad gcig pa ste /
analyzed: gang gzugs la rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog pa thams cad gcig pa ste /
translated: All thoughts and concepts about form are the same.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this.

original: dngos por mi rtog pa dang / dngos po med par mi rtog pa dang / chad par mi rtog pa dang / rtag par mi rtog pa dang / skye bar mi rtog pa dang / mi skye bar mi rtog pa dang / rtog pa dang /
analyzed: dngos por mi rtog pa dang / dngos po med par mi rtog pa dang / chad par mi rtog pa dang / rtag par mi rtog pa dang / skye bar mi rtog pa dang / mi skye bar mi rtog pa dang / rtog pa dang /
translated: It is not conceptualizing things, not conceptualizing non-things, not conceptualizing annihilation, not conceptualizing permanence, not conceptualizing arising, not conceptualizing non-arising, not conceptualizing conceptualization,

original: mi rtog pa la mi rtog pa dang / rtog pa med pa dang / rnam par mi rtog pa dang / yang dag pa'i lam la mi rtog pa de ni yang dag pa'i rtog @323a *//
analyzed: mi rtog pa la mi rtog pa dang / rtog pa med pa dang / rnam par mi rtog pa dang / yang dag pa'i lam la mi rtog pa de ni yang dag pa'i rtog @323a *//
translated: not conceptualizing non-conceptualization, not conceptualizing non-conceptuality, not conceptualizing the correct path.

original: pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: pa zhes bya'o //
translated: That is called right conceptualization.

original: gang gzugs la chos thams cad brjod du med pa dang / brjod pa med pa dang / dbyangs dang / dbyangs med pa mnyam pa nyid dang / ming med pa dang / ming du brjod pa med pa dang / 'tshol ba med pa dang / lam gyi yan lag ma yin pa dang /
analyzed: gang gzugs la chos thams cad brjod du med pa dang / brjod pa med pa dang / dbyangs dang / dbyangs med pa mnyam pa nyid dang / ming med pa dang / ming du brjod pa med pa dang / 'tshol ba med pa dang / lam gyi yan lag ma yin pa dang /
translated: It is the sameness of all phenomena in form, which is inexpressible, not expressed, without sound or no sound, without name, not named, not sought, not a branch of the path,

original: yang dag pa zhes bya ba ngag gi lam thams cad la kun tu mi rgyu zhing mi brjod pa dang / lam zhes bya ba'i chos ma lus pa brjod pa de ni yang dag pa'i dag ces bya'o //
analyzed: yang dag pa zhes bya ba ngag gi lam thams cad la kun tu mi rgyu zhing mi brjod pa dang / lam zhes bya ba'i chos ma lus pa brjod pa de ni yang dag pa'i dag ces bya'o //
translated: The so-called ‘correct’ is not to engage in or express any verbal path. The so-called ‘path’ is to express all phenomena. That is called ‘correct.’

original: gang gzugs la las thams cad kyi rang bzhin la las med par mngon par zhen pa 'di lta ste; mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la mngon par zhen pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa thob pa rnams la 'tshol ba med pa dang /
analyzed: gang gzugs la las thams cad kyi rang bzhin la las med par mngon par zhen pa 'di lta ste; mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la mngon par zhen pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa thob pa rnams la 'tshol ba med pa dang /
translated: “The nature of all actions in form is to be without action. This is clinging to non-action, clinging to non-conditioning, and seeking out those who have attained non-conditioning.

original: yang dag pa 'tshol ba'am /🔽log pa 'tshol ba'am /
analyzed: yang dag pa 'tshol ba'am / log pa 'tshol ba'am /
translated: “Correct seeking,🔽wrong seeking,

original: log pa ma yin pa 'tshol ba'am /
analyzed: log pa ma yin pa 'tshol ba'am /
translated: non-wrong seeking,

original: las 'tshol ba'am /
analyzed: las 'tshol ba'am /
translated: seeking action,

original: las ma yin pa 'tshol ba'am /
analyzed: las ma yin pa 'tshol ba'am /
translated: seeking non-action,

original: las dang / las ma yin pa thams cad khas mi len pa de ni nges pa dang ma nges pa dang / yang dag pa nyid dang / log pa nyid dang / dge ba dang / mi dge ba dang / lung du ma bstan pa dang /
analyzed: las dang / las ma yin pa thams cad khas mi len pa de ni nges pa dang ma nges pa dang / yang dag pa nyid dang / log pa nyid dang / dge ba dang / mi dge ba dang / lung du ma bstan pa dang /
translated: and not accepting any action or non-action—that is the definite and the indefinite, the correct and the incorrect, the virtuous and the non-virtuous, and the neutral.

original: mi g-yo ba mngon par 'du mi byed pa dang / lam dang / lam ma yin pa mtha' yas pa skye ba med pas bsdus pa dang / mig yor lta bu'i tshul gyis las kyi mtha' thams cad mi byed pas yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' zhes bya'o //
analyzed: mi g-yo ba mngon par 'du mi byed pa dang / lam dang / lam ma yin pa mtha' yas pa skye ba med pas bsdus pa dang / mig yor lta bu'i tshul gyis las kyi mtha' thams cad mi byed pas yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' zhes bya'o //
translated: It is the non-performance of all actions by way of the mode of a reflected image, and it is the correct action that is included in the infinite non-arising of the unmoving, the non-performance of action, and the path and the non-path.

original: gang @323b gzugs la kun tu longs spyod pa dang / kun tu longs spyod pa ma yin pa shes pa dang / de la gnas pa chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid kyi tshul gyis yang dag pa dang / log pa'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa dang /
analyzed: gang @323b gzugs la kun tu longs spyod pa dang / kun tu longs spyod pa ma yin pa shes pa dang / de la gnas pa chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid kyi tshul gyis yang dag pa dang / log pa'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa dang /
translated: It is the correct livelihood that is the non-apprehension of correct and incorrect feelings by way of the sameness of the realm of phenomena, the knowledge of the enjoyment and non-enjoyment of form, and the abiding in that.

original: mi dmigs pas 'tsho ba dang / las 'jig pa de ni yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba zhes bya ste /
analyzed: mi dmigs pas 'tsho ba dang / las 'jig pa de ni yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba zhes bya ste /
translated: It is the correct livelihood that is the destruction of action by way of the non-apprehension of livelihood.

original: yang dag pa zhes bya ba de ni mnyam pa nyid kyi tshig go /
analyzed: yang dag pa zhes bya ba de ni mnyam pa nyid kyi tshig go /
translated: Correct is a word for sameness.

original: 'tsho ba zhes bya ba de ni 'phags pa'i chos 'dzin pa'i tshig go /
analyzed: 'tsho ba zhes bya ba de ni 'phags pa'i chos 'dzin pa'i tshig go /
translated: Livelihood is a word for upholding the Dharma of the Āryas.

original: lam zhes bya ba dang / lam ma yin pa zhes bya ba de ni mi 'tshol ba'i don gyis lam zhes bya'o //
analyzed: lam zhes bya ba dang / lam ma yin pa zhes bya ba de ni mi 'tshol ba'i don gyis lam zhes bya'o //
translated: The meaning of ‘path’ is that it is not a path that is sought.

original: 'tsho ba dang / 'tsho ba ma yin pa'i 'du shes la rnam par mi rtog pa'i don gyis 'tsho ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'tsho ba dang / 'tsho ba ma yin pa'i 'du shes la rnam par mi rtog pa'i don gyis 'tsho ba zhes bya'o //
translated: The meaning of ‘livelihood’ is that it is not a livelihood that is conceptualized.

original: yang dag pa zhes bya ba de ni mnyam pa nyid la gnas pa zhes bya ba'i don te /
analyzed: yang dag pa zhes bya ba de ni mnyam pa nyid la gnas pa zhes bya ba'i don te /
translated: The meaning of ‘correct’ is that it is the state of being in sameness.

original: de ni yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de ni yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba zhes bya'o //
translated: That is called ‘correct livelihood.’

original: chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid kyi tshul gyis gang gzugs la lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi rtsol ba med pa ni chos kyi dbyings la rtsol ba med pa ste /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid kyi tshul gyis gang gzugs la lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi rtsol ba med pa ni chos kyi dbyings la rtsol ba med pa ste /
translated: The way of the sameness of the realm of phenomena is that the body, speech, and mind do not strive in form.

original: yang dag pa zhes bya ba de ni mi skye ba la gnas pa'i chos rnams blang ba med pa dang / dor ba med pa'i tshig bla dvags so //
analyzed: yang dag pa zhes bya ba de ni mi skye ba la gnas pa'i chos rnams blang ba med pa dang / dor ba med pa'i tshig bla dvags so //
translated: The meaning of ‘correct’ is that it is the state of being in the unborn phenomena, which is a synonym for ‘not taking up’ and ‘not rejecting.’

original: rtsol ba med pa zhes bya ba de ni lus dang / ngag dang / yid mi dmigs pa'i tshig go /
analyzed: rtsol ba med pa zhes bya ba de ni lus dang / ngag dang / yid mi dmigs pa'i tshig go /
translated: The meaning of ‘without striving’ is that the body, speech, and mind are not observed.

original: lam zhes bya ba de ni blang ba med pa dang / dor pa med pa'i tshul dang / mi 'tshol ba'i tshul gyis 'phags pa'i don 'tshol ba ste /
analyzed: lam zhes bya ba de ni blang ba med pa dang / dor pa med pa'i tshul dang / mi 'tshol ba'i tshul gyis 'phags pa'i don 'tshol ba ste /
translated: The so-called path is the noble search for meaning through the way of not adopting and not rejecting, and the way of not seeking.

original: de ni yang dag pa'i rtsol ba zhes @324a *//
analyzed: de ni yang dag pa'i rtsol ba zhes @324a *//
translated: That is called right effort.

original: bya'o; ;gang gzugs la dran pas mi dmigs pa mnyam pa nyid ni dran pa med pa dran pa med pa'i tshul gyis dran pa la sbyor ba ste /
analyzed: bya'o; ;gang gzugs la dran pas mi dmigs pa mnyam pa nyid ni dran pa med pa dran pa med pa'i tshul gyis dran pa la sbyor ba ste /
translated: The sameness of the non-apprehension of form through mindfulness is the application of mindfulness through the way of non-mindfulness.

original: yang dag pa zhes bya ba de ni dmigs pa med pa mnyam pa nyid sgro btags pa med pa'i tshig go /
analyzed: yang dag pa zhes bya ba de ni dmigs pa med pa mnyam pa nyid sgro btags pa med pa'i tshig go /
translated: That which is called right is the sameness of the non-apprehension of objects, the word for non-superimposition.

original: dran pa zhes bya ba de ni phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rjes su dran pa'i tshig go /
analyzed: dran pa zhes bya ba de ni phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rjes su dran pa'i tshig go /
translated: That which is called mindfulness is the word for the recollection of the aggregates, elements, and sense sources.

original: stong pa nyid rjes su dran pa'i tshig dang; mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rjes su dran pa'i tshig dang / de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin lhun gyis grub pa'i rjes su dran pa'i tshig de ni yang dag pa'i dran pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid rjes su dran pa'i tshig dang; mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rjes su dran pa'i tshig dang / de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin lhun gyis grub pa'i rjes su dran pa'i tshig de ni yang dag pa'i dran pa zhes bya'o //
translated: The words of the recollection of emptiness, the words of the recollection of signlessness, the words of the recollection of wishlessness, the words of the recollection of the unconditioned, the words of the recollection of the Tathāgata’s spontaneous wisdom, the words of the recollection of the Tathāgata’s spontaneous samādhi—these are called right mindfulness.

original: gang gzugs la dbyer med pa shes pa ni mnyam pa nyid dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi las yang dag par bsgrubs pa ste /
analyzed: gang gzugs la dbyer med pa shes pa ni mnyam pa nyid dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi las yang dag par bsgrubs pa ste /
translated: “The knowledge of the indivisibility of form is the accomplishment of the activity of sameness and samādhi.

original: gzugs gang dang mnyam pa tshor pa dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'ang de dang mnyam zhing /
analyzed: gzugs gang dang mnyam pa tshor pa dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'ang de dang mnyam zhing /
translated: Form is the same as feeling, perception, formation, and consciousness.

original: phung po gang dang mnyam pa ting nge 'dzin kyang mnyam par yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo //
analyzed: phung po gang dang mnyam pa ting nge 'dzin kyang mnyam par yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo //
translated: The sameness of the aggregates is also the sameness of samādhi.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin kyang de dang mnyam par yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin kyang de dang mnyam par yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo //
translated: The samādhi of the Tathāgata family is also seen to be the same.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin gang dang mnyam par yang dag par rjes su mthong ba chos thams cad kyang de dang mnyam pa yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo //🔽sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad gang dang mnyam par yang dag par rjes su @324b mthong ba byis pa so so'i skye bo'i chos thams cad kyang de dang mnyam par yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin gang dang mnyam par yang dag par rjes su mthong ba chos thams cad kyang de dang mnyam pa yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo // sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad gang dang mnyam par yang dag par rjes su @324b mthong ba byis pa so so'i skye bo'i chos thams cad kyang de dang mnyam par yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo //
translated: He sees all phenomena as equal to the sameness of the samādhi of the family of the tathāgatas.🔽He sees all the qualities of the buddhas as equal to the sameness of the samādhi of the family of the tathāgatas.🔽He sees all the qualities of ordinary foolish beings as equal to the sameness of the samādhi of the family of the tathāgatas.

original: byis pa so so'i skye bo'i chos thams cad gang dang mnyam par yang dag par rjes su mthong ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang de dang mnyam par yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo //
analyzed: byis pa so so'i skye bo'i chos thams cad gang dang mnyam par yang dag par rjes su mthong ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang de dang mnyam par yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo //
translated: He sees all the qualities of ordinary foolish beings as equal to the sameness of the samādhi of the family of the tathāgatas.

original: ting nge 'dzin gang dang mnyam pa 'das pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams kyang de dang mnyam par yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang dang mnyam pa 'das pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams kyang de dang mnyam par yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo //
translated: He sees the past aggregates, elements, and sense fields as equal to the sameness of the samādhi of the family of the tathāgatas.

original: ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams kyang de bzhin du yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo //
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams kyang de bzhin du yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo //
translated: He sees the aggregates, elements, and sense bases of the past in the same way, and he sees the aggregates, elements, and sense bases of the future and the present in the same way.

original: phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams ji lta ba bzhin du las dang / rnam par smin pa'ang de ltar yang dag par rjes su mthong ste /
analyzed: phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams ji lta ba bzhin du las dang / rnam par smin pa'ang de ltar yang dag par rjes su mthong ste /
translated: Just as he sees the aggregates, elements, and sense bases, so he sees karma and its ripening.

original: dus gsum mnyam pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rigs la zhugs pa de ni yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
analyzed: dus gsum mnyam pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rigs la zhugs pa de ni yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
translated: He enters the family of the sameness of the three times. This is called right samādhi.

original: gang gzugs la de kho na shes pa dang / de bzhin nyid shes pa de ni bden pa shes pa ste /
analyzed: gang gzugs la de kho na shes pa dang / de bzhin nyid shes pa de ni bden pa shes pa ste /
translated: The knowledge of suchness and the knowledge of reality in form is the knowledge of the truth.

original: chos nyid kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams kyi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: chos nyid kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams kyi rang bzhin no //
translated: The nature of reality is the nature of the aggregates, elements, and sense bases.

original: chos nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa ni phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched kyi rang bzhin med par bden pa nyid du mos so //
analyzed: chos nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa ni phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched kyi rang bzhin med par bden pa nyid du mos so //
translated: The absence of the nature of reality is the absence of the nature of the aggregates, elements, and sense bases. He is convinced of the truth of this.

original: byin gyi rlabs zhes bya ba de ni slu ba med pa'i chos nyid kyi tshig bla dvags so //
analyzed: byin gyi rlabs zhes bya ba de ni slu ba med pa'i chos nyid kyi tshig bla dvags so //
translated: “Empowerment” is a term for the nature of non-deception.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: mi slu ba gang yin pa de ni bden pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mi slu ba gang yin pa de ni bden pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because that which is non-deceptive is true.

original: de la gnas pa ni yang @325a *//
analyzed: de la gnas pa ni yang @325a *//
translated: Those who abide in that

original: dag pa'i smon lam brjod pa dang / las yang dag par spyod pa mngon sum du 'gyur te /
analyzed: dag pa'i smon lam brjod pa dang / las yang dag par spyod pa mngon sum du 'gyur te /
translated: will have pure aspirations and will manifest the performance of pure actions.

original: phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa kun tu ston par byin gyis rlob bo //
analyzed: phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa kun tu ston par byin gyis rlob bo //
translated: They will be empowered to display the emanations of the Tathāgata in those aggregates, elements, and sense bases.

original: sa'i bden pa nyid gang dang mnyam pa chu dang / me dang / rlung gi bden pa nyid kyang de dang mnyam mo //
analyzed: sa'i bden pa nyid gang dang mnyam pa chu dang / me dang / rlung gi bden pa nyid kyang de dang mnyam mo //
translated: The truth of earth is the same as the truth of water, fire, and wind.

original: nam mkha' dang / chos dang / sgra dang / mig yor dang / gzugs brnyan dang / mtshan nyid dang bcas pa dang / mtshan nyid med pa dang / chags pa dang bcas pa dang / chags pa ma yin pa dang / bsdus pa'i bskal pa dang /
analyzed: nam mkha' dang / chos dang / sgra dang / mig yor dang / gzugs brnyan dang / mtshan nyid dang bcas pa dang / mtshan nyid med pa dang / chags pa dang bcas pa dang / chags pa ma yin pa dang / bsdus pa'i bskal pa dang /
translated: space, phenomena, sound, optical illusions, reflections, characteristics, the absence of characteristics, attachment, nonattachment, eons of gathering,

original: rgya che ba'i bskal pa dang / grangs yod pa'i bskal pa dang / grangs med pa'i bskal pa dang / sangs rgyas dang bcas pa'i bskal pa dang / sangs rgyas mi 'byung ba'i bskal pa dang / 'das pa'i bskal pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i bskal pa dang /
analyzed: rgya che ba'i bskal pa dang / grangs yod pa'i bskal pa dang / grangs med pa'i bskal pa dang / sangs rgyas dang bcas pa'i bskal pa dang / sangs rgyas mi 'byung ba'i bskal pa dang / 'das pa'i bskal pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i bskal pa dang /
translated: vast eons, countable eons, uncountable eons, eons with buddhas, eons without buddhas, past eons, future eons,

original: ma 'ongs pa dang 'das pa'i bskal pa dang / da ltar byung ba dang ma 'ongs pa dang 'das pa'i bskal pa dang / 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i bskal pa'ang de dang mnyam ste /
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa dang 'das pa'i bskal pa dang / da ltar byung ba dang ma 'ongs pa dang 'das pa'i bskal pa dang / 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i bskal pa'ang de dang mnyam ste /
translated: future and past eons, present, future, and past eons, and past, future, and present eons are the same.

original: kun nas nyon mongs pa'i bskal pa la rnam par byang ba'i bskal pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i bskal pa la kun nas nyon mongs pa'i bskal pa dang / byin gyi rlabs kyi bskal pa la mnyam pa nyid kyi bskal pa 'jug ste /
analyzed: kun nas nyon mongs pa'i bskal pa la rnam par byang ba'i bskal pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i bskal pa la kun nas nyon mongs pa'i bskal pa dang / byin gyi rlabs kyi bskal pa la mnyam pa nyid kyi bskal pa 'jug ste /
translated: The eon of purification is included in the eon of affliction, and the eon of affliction is included in the eon of purification. The eon of transformation is included in the eon of equality.

original: 'jug pa shes pa de la mngon par zhen @325b pa med pa de ni chos kyi dbyings bden pa nyid kyi phyir bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs zhes bya ste /
analyzed: 'jug pa shes pa de la mngon par zhen @325b pa med pa de ni chos kyi dbyings bden pa nyid kyi phyir bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs zhes bya ste /
translated: The knowledge of their inclusion is not attachment. This is called the transformation of truth, because the realm of truth is true.

original: gzugs nyid bden pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs nyid bden pa'o //
translated: Form itself is truth.

original: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa nyid bden pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa nyid bden pa'o //
translated: Likewise, feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness itself are truth.

original: de la gnas pa'i bden pa'i ngag gang yin pa de ni byin gyi rlabs te /
analyzed: de la gnas pa'i bden pa'i ngag gang yin pa de ni byin gyi rlabs te /
translated: The words of truth that are based on that are a transformation.

original: de ni bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de ni bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called the transformation of truth.

original: gang mnyam pa nyid kyi tshul gyis gang gzugs la 'dzin pa med pa dang / mchog tu 'dzin pa med pa dang / gtong ba dang / dor ba de ni gtong ba'i byin gyi rlabs zhes bya'o //🔽gang gzugs la blang ba med pa dang / dor ba med pa shes pa de ni g-yo ba dang / 'gul ba thams cad zhi ba'o //🔽byin gyi rlabs zhes bya ba ni zhi ba de la gnas nas kun nas nyon mongs pa ni rnam par byang bar byin gyis rlob pa dang; rnam par byang ba ni kun nas nyon mongs par byin gyi rlob pa dang / zhi ba de la gnas nas spyod lam kun tu bstan pas tshangs pa nye bar zhi ba'i spyod lam can rnams kyang 'dod pa skyed pa dang /
analyzed: gang mnyam pa nyid kyi tshul gyis gang gzugs la 'dzin pa med pa dang / mchog tu 'dzin pa med pa dang / gtong ba dang / dor ba de ni gtong ba'i byin gyi rlabs zhes bya'o // gang gzugs la blang ba med pa dang / dor ba med pa shes pa de ni g-yo ba dang / 'gul ba thams cad zhi ba'o // byin gyi rlabs zhes bya ba ni zhi ba de la gnas nas kun nas nyon mongs pa ni rnam par byang bar byin gyis rlob pa dang; rnam par byang ba ni kun nas nyon mongs par byin gyi rlob pa dang / zhi ba de la gnas nas spyod lam kun tu bstan pas tshangs pa nye bar zhi ba'i spyod lam can rnams kyang 'dod pa skyed pa dang /
translated: The consecration of non-giving is the non-giving of form, the non-giving of the formless, the non-giving of the formless and the form, the non-giving of the form and the formless, the non-giving of the form and the formless and the formless and the form.🔽The consecration of non-giving is the non-giving of form, the non-giving of the formless, the non-giving of the formless and the form, the non-giving of the form and the formless, the non-giving of the form and the formless and the formless and the form.🔽The consecration of non-giving is the non-giving of form, the non-giving of the formless, the non-giving of the formless and the form, the non-giving of the form and the formless, the non-giving of the form and the formless and the formless and the form.🔽The consecration of non-giving is the non-giving of form, the non-giving of the formless, the non-giving of the formless and the form, the non-giving of the form and the formless, the non-giving of the form and the formless and the formless and the form.🔽The consecration of non-giving is the non-giving of form, the non-giving of the formless, the non-giving of the formless and the form, the non-giving of the form and the formless, the non-giving of the form and the formless and the formless and the form.

original: lag na rdo rje'i gzugs kun tu bstan pas ma zhi ba'i spyod lam can rnams sam /
analyzed: lag na rdo rje'i gzugs kun tu bstan pas ma zhi ba'i spyod lam can rnams sam /
translated: The consecration of non-giving is the non-giving of form, the non-giving of the formless, the non-giving of the formless and the form, the non-giving of the form and the formless, the non-giving of the form and

original: bdud thams cad kyang nye bar zhi ba'i byin gyi rlabs la mos par byed pa'o; ;nye bar zhi ba'i byin gyi rlabs ni byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad shin tu zhi ba dang / nye bar zhi ba dang / rab tu zhi ba ste /🔽nye bar zhi ba'i byin gyi rlabs thob par yang dag @326a *//
analyzed: bdud thams cad kyang nye bar zhi ba'i byin gyi rlabs la mos par byed pa'o; ;nye bar zhi ba'i byin gyi rlabs ni byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad shin tu zhi ba dang / nye bar zhi ba dang / rab tu zhi ba ste / nye bar zhi ba'i byin gyi rlabs thob par yang dag @326a *//
translated: He also inspires all demons to aspire to the blessing of complete peace. The blessing of complete peace is the complete peace, the complete pacification, and the complete cessation of all childish ordinary beings.

original: par rjes su mthong ba de ni nye bar zhi ba'i byin gyi rlabs zhes bya'o //
analyzed: par rjes su mthong ba de ni nye bar zhi ba'i byin gyi rlabs zhes bya'o //
translated: Seeing the attainment of the blessing of complete peace as it truly is is called the blessing of complete peace.

original: gang gdeg pa med pa dang / gzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis gzugs la chos kyi dbyings dang dbyer med par shes shing spros pa dang bral ba'i shes rab kyis shin tu zhi ba dang / nye bar zhi ba dang / spros pa med pa'i chos thams cad phung po dang /
analyzed: gang gdeg pa med pa dang / gzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis gzugs la chos kyi dbyings dang dbyer med par shes shing spros pa dang bral ba'i shes rab kyis shin tu zhi ba dang / nye bar zhi ba dang / spros pa med pa'i chos thams cad phung po dang /
translated: The blessing of the absence of conceptual proliferation is the knowledge that form is inseparable from the realm of phenomena, and the complete peace, the complete pacification, and the complete cessation of all phenomena, which are free from conceptual proliferation, through the wisdom that is free from conceptual elaboration, by means of the method that does not elevate and does not denigrate.

original: khams dang / skye mched thams cad la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du byin gyis rlob pa de ni shes rab kyi byin gyi rlabs zhes bya'o //
analyzed: khams dang / skye mched thams cad la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du byin gyis rlob pa de ni shes rab kyi byin gyi rlabs zhes bya'o //
translated: The consecration of all the elements and sense-spheres in omniscience is called the consecration of wisdom.

original: yang na byin gyi rlabs zhes bya ba de ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i rjes su 'gro ba ni shes rab kyi gnas te /
analyzed: yang na byin gyi rlabs zhes bya ba de ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i rjes su 'gro ba ni shes rab kyi gnas te /
translated: Or, consecration is the abode of wisdom, which is the pursuit of omniscience.

original: de'i phyir bdag gis lus 'dom gang tsam po 'di la 'jig rten gdags par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir bdag gis lus 'dom gang tsam po 'di la 'jig rten gdags par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, I will designate the world in this body of mine, which is only one cubit in size.

original: 'jig rten kun 'byung ba dang / 'jig rten 'gog pa dang / 'jig rten 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi bar yang gdags par bya'o snyam pa ste /
analyzed: 'jig rten kun 'byung ba dang / 'jig rten 'gog pa dang / 'jig rten 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi bar yang gdags par bya'o snyam pa ste /
translated: I will designate the origin of the world, the cessation of the world, the path leading to the cessation of the world, up to omniscient wisdom.

original: de ni shes rab kyi byin gyi rlabs zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de ni shes rab kyi byin gyi rlabs zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called the consecration of wisdom.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to //

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi stobs du zhig dang ldan na rab tu zhi ba'i rnam par nges pa'i cho 'phrul gyi ting nge 'dzin 'di thob / de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon @326b nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //

analyzed: 'jam dpal / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi stobs sum cu rtsa drug dang ldan na /

analyzed: 'di lta ste /

analyzed: thos pa rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi stobs dang / las kyi sgrib pa rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi stobs dang / cho ga dang / spyod yul rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi stobs dang / dran pa rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi stobs dang /

translated: the wisdom power of pure skill in means, the wisdom power of pure focus on sentient beings, the wisdom power of pure focus on signs, the wisdom power of pure giving,🔽the wisdom power of pure acceptance of sentient beings, the wisdom power of pure accomplishment of great love, the wisdom power of pure great compassion,

original: stobs dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms chen po rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi stobs dang / tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi stobs dang / tshul khrims kyis rjes su 'dzin pa rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi stobs dang /
analyzed: stobs dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms chen po rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi stobs dang / tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi stobs dang / tshul khrims kyis rjes su 'dzin pa rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi stobs dang /
translated: the wisdom power of pure great joy and equanimity, the wisdom power of pure discipline, the wisdom power of pure acceptance through discipline,

original: bzod pa rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi stobs dang / bzod pas rjes su 'dzin pa rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi stobs dang / brtson 'grus kyi bsam pa rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi stobs dang / brtson 'grus yang dag par len pa rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi stobs dang /
analyzed: bzod pa rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi stobs dang / bzod pas rjes su 'dzin pa rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi stobs dang / brtson 'grus kyi bsam pa rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi stobs dang / brtson 'grus yang dag par len pa rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi stobs dang /
translated: the wisdom power of pure patience, the wisdom power of pure acceptance through patience, the wisdom power of pure intention in diligence, the wisdom power of pure application in diligence,

original: khams la mkhas pa rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi stobs dang / bsam gtan la mkhas pa rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi stobs dang / zhi gnas la mkhas pa rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi stobs dang / shes rab rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi stobs dang /

translated: the wisdom power of pure skill in the elements, the wisdom power of pure skill in concentration, the wisdom power of pure skill in tranquility, the wisdom power of pure insight,

original: thos pa rnam par nges pa rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi stobs dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rnam par nges pa rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi stobs dang / shes pa rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi stobs dang /🔽'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi stobs dang / lhag mthong la mkhas pa rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi stobs dang / rig pa dang / rnam par grol ba rnam par @327b dag pa'i ye shes kyi stobs dang /

translated: the power of wisdom of the pure ascertainment of learning, the power of wisdom of the pure ascertainment of the mundane and supramundane, the power of wisdom of pure knowledge,🔽the power of wisdom of the pure conditioned and unconditioned, the power of wisdom of the pure skill in insight, the power of wisdom of the pure knowledge of liberation and awareness,

original: mi skye ba la bzod pa rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi stobs dang / mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi stobs dang / don dam pa dang / kun rdzob rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi stobs dang /
analyzed: mi skye ba la bzod pa rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi stobs dang / mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi stobs dang / don dam pa dang / kun rdzob rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi stobs dang /
translated: the power of wisdom of the pure acceptance of non-arising, the power of wisdom of the pure single characteristic of the absence of characteristics, the power of wisdom of the pure ultimate and relative,🔽and the power of wisdom of the pure knowledge of the three times.

original: 'dun pa dang / brtson 'grus tshad med pa rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi stobs te /
analyzed: 'dun pa dang / brtson 'grus tshad med pa rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi stobs te /

original: 'jam dpal / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi stobs sum cu rtsa drug po de dag dang ldan na rab tu zhi ba rnam par nges pa'i cho 'phrul gyi ting nge 'dzin 'di 'thob bo //
analyzed: 'jam dpal / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi stobs sum cu rtsa drug po de dag dang ldan na rab tu zhi ba rnam par nges pa'i cho 'phrul gyi ting nge 'dzin 'di 'thob bo //
translated: Mañjuśrī, if bodhisattva mahāsattvas possess these thirty-six pure wisdom powers, they will attain this samādhi of the miraculous ascertainment of peace.

analyzed: 'jam dpal / yongs su brtag pa nye bar bzung ste /
translated: Mañjuśrī, let us consider this hypothetical case:

original: byang chub sems dpa' gang la las 'jig rten gyi khams bcu'i rdzul phra rab kyi rdzul snyed kyi bskal par phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas pa /

translated: If a certain bodhisattva were to practice for as many eons as there are atoms in ten buddha realms, in all the world systems in the ten directions, and were to make offerings to all the buddhas and bodhisattvas in each world system,

analyzed: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang bcas pa gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnams la lha'i zas dang / lha'i ras bcos bu'i na bza' rnams phul ba dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdal phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rnams nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal pos rab tu bkang ste dbul ba phul ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa re re'i phyir yang nor @328a *//
translated: and he offered as many world systems as there are atoms in the three-thousand-fold world systems, each filled with the precious gem king of jewels.🔽For each of the tathāgatas, he built a stūpa of the precious gem that collects all light,

analyzed: bu rin po che snang ba thams cad yang dag par bsags pa'i mchod rten tshad dzambu'i gling tsam du yod pa /

analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag byas te /
translated: He would make as many stūpas as there are atoms in ten world systems,

original: mchod rten re re la'ang sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyis bskal par lha'i mchod pa mtshungs pa med par byas kyang byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gang gis dad pas ting nge 'dzin 'di la mos nas /

translated: and for as many eons as there are atoms in ten buddha-fields, he would make incomparable divine offerings to each stūpa. But another bodhisattva, with faith, may aspire to this samādhi,

translated: and give just one morsel of food to an animal. The merit from that would not be matched by the previous merit.

original: stong gi cha dang / brgya stong gi cha dang / bye ba brgya'i cha dang / bye ba stong gi cha dang / bye ba brgya stong gi cha dang / dpe dang / rgyur yang mi bzod do //

translated: It would not bear comparison, even for a hundredth part, or a thousandth part, or a hundred thousandth part, or a ten millionth part, or a billionth part, or by any number, fraction, calculation, example, or comparison.

translated: Mañjuśrī, if a bodhisattva has faith in this samādhi,

translated: Mañjuśrī, if a bodhisattva were to offer to the Three Jewels for ten thousand eons, and if another bodhisattva were to hear the name of this samādhi of the miraculous ascertainment of peace,🔽and were to have faith in it, then the latter would generate incalculably more merit than the former.

analyzed: 'jam dpal / rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: Mañjuśrī, if a son of a good family or
